title: Turkey Red Clam Shell Cigarette Box - SOLD
author: canjond

posts.post_title: Turkey Red Clam Shell Cigarette Box - SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is this graphically beautiful Turkey Red cigarette Box.  This box is complete with an unbroken spine and full back tax stamp.  The box is not crushed in any way and aside from the scuff to the front cover, grades EX-NM.

While I would not classify Turkey Red boxes as rare, they are difficult to find and I can't recall the last one I saw for sale besides this one.  Would display nicely with a T3.

SOLD

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/TRfront.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/TRback.jpg[/IMG]

it's always my pleasure, Jon.
your packs are truly the best around.

all the best,buddy

barry

Jon,
I absolutely love the Turkey red pack which i just received.
i am amazed at what great shape it is in.
The spine is like brand new.  The writing inside the shell looks perfect.
And the colors of the pack are vibrant!
I think this may well be my second favorite---with the AB(purchased from you) holding the #1 spot, probably in perpetuity.
all the best,

barry
